issue.title: Thirdparty order validation default status
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In Front-end, the screen "thirdparty orders-validation" has two errors :


- default status is set to "done" which is wrong. It should be set to status "to do" (logical since the user go there to validate new request).
- default view (the one described above) returns all the request ("to do" and "done"), it should just return the list with status selected.



**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

It works, thanks
